dishes.name: Meat Eater
dishes.discription: A made-to-order and quickly-baked pizza topped with pepperoni, crumbled meatballs, red onion, mozzarella, and red (tomato) sauce.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.text: hello yeah its me, and I have no idea what I am doing here...... But this food is awsome!!!

dishes.name: Hot Link
dishes.discription: The new pizza features the chain’s classic dough topped with spicy red sauce, jalepeños, sausage, black olives, red onions, banana peppers and mozzarella cheese.

dishes.name: Red Vine
dishes.discription: Blaze Pizza's Red Vine Pizza is basically their version of a margherita pizza and comes topped with ovalini mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, parmesan, basil, red sauce, and olive oil drizzle.

dishes.name: S'More Pie
dishes.discription: Blaze Pizza's S'more Pie features melted milk chocolate and marshmallow sandwiched between two large rounds of McVitie's biscuits.
